array.name: greetings
array.item: Tell me your inner most feelings.
Did I ever tell you about when I was a seed?
Do you know if pumpkin are a kind of squash? Am I a squash?
I am programmed to banter pointlessly.
When is an orange not an orange? When it\'s a pumpkin.
What was the pumpkin\'s favorite sport? Squash.
What do you get if you divide the circumference of a pumpkin by it\'s diameter? Pumpkin pi.
What\'s black, white, orange and waddles? A penguin carrying a pumpkin.
Why was Cinderella not so good at surfing? Because her coach was a pumpkin.
There\'s pumpkin strange happening around here…
My orders are to pumkinate you.
Pumkin protocols engaged. All systems nominal.
Beep beep boop beep. Very busy right now… doing robot pumpkin things.
You\'re good looking for a human.
Do you know who I am?
